languages.text: И прочитал{mf||а} Домин слова, и произнес{mf||ла} их. И стало тело Судии перестраиваться по новому, прекрасному и ужасному замыслу. Ибо нет невозможного для души, постигнувшей сокрытую мудрость.

And the Domin read the words, and spoke them. And the Judge's body began to rebuild itself to a new design, as beautiful as it was terrifying. For nothing is impossible when a soul has grasped the hidden wisdom.
languages.original_text: И прочитал{mf||а} Домин слова, и произнес{mf||ла} их. И стало тело Судии перестраиваться по новому, прекрасному и ужасному замыслу. Ибо нет невозможного для души, постигнувшей сокрытую мудрость.

traits.locale_text: And the Enim read the words, and spoke them. And the Judge's body began to rebuild itself to a new design, as beautiful as it was terrifying. For nothing is impossible for a soul that has grasped the hidden wisdom.

And the Enim read the words, and spoke them. And the Judge's body began to rebuild itself to a new design, as beautiful as it was terrifying. For nothing is impossible for a soul that has grasped the hidden wisdom.

And the Enim read the words, and spoke them. And the Judge's body began to rebuild itself to a new design, as beautiful as it was terrifying. For nothing is impossible when a soul has grasped the hidden wisdom.

And the Enim read the words, and spoke them. And the Judge's body began to rebuild itself to a new design, as beautiful as it was terrifying. For nothing is impossible when a soul has grasped the hidden wisdom.

And the Domin read the words, and spoke them. And the Judge's body began to rebuild itself to a new design, as beautiful as it was terrifying. For nothing is impossible when a soul has grasped the hidden wisdom.

And the Domin read the words, and spoke them. And the Judge's body began to rebuild itself to a new design, as beautiful as it was terrifying. For nothing is impossible when a soul has grasped the hidden wisdom.

languages.text: Und {mf|der|die} Domin las die Worte und sprach sie aus. Und der Körper des Richters begann, sich ebenso schön wie entsetzlich nach einem neuen Plan umzugestalten. Denn nichts ist unmöglich, wenn eine Seele die verborgene Weisheit begriffen hat.
languages.original_text: And the Domin read the words, and spoke them. And the Judge's body began to rebuild itself to a new design, as beautiful as it was terrifying. For nothing is impossible when a soul has grasped the hidden wisdom.

traits.locale_text: Und {mf|der|die} Domin las die Worte und sprach sie aus. Und der Körper des Richters begann, sich ebenso schön wie entsetzlich nach einem neuen Plan umzugestalten. Denn nichts ist unmöglich, wenn eine Seele die verborgene Weisheit begriffen hat.

languages.text: Y {mf|el|la} Domin leyó las palabras y las pronunció. Y el cuerpo del Juez empezó a adoptar un nuevo diseño, tan bello como terrible. Pues un alma que comprende el saber oculto lo puede todo.
languages.original_text: And the Domin read the words, and spoke them. And the Judge's body began to rebuild itself to a new design, as beautiful as it was terrifying. For nothing is impossible when a soul has grasped the hidden wisdom.

traits.locale_text: Y {mf|el|la} Domin leyó las palabras y las pronunció. Y el cuerpo del Juez empezó a adoptar un nuevo diseño, tan bello como terrible. Pues un alma que comprende el saber oculto lo puede todo.

languages.text: ドミンはその言葉を読み、それを話した。そしてジャッジの体は新たな形に自ら再構築し始めた。恐ろしいほど美しく。魂が隠されていた知恵を手にしたとき、不可能なことはなくなる。
languages.original_text: And the Domin read the words, and spoke them. And the Judge's body began to rebuild itself to a new design, as beautiful as it was terrifying. For nothing is impossible when a soul has grasped the hidden wisdom.

traits.locale_text: エニムはその言葉を読み、それを話した。そしてジャッジの体は新たな形に自ら再構築し始めた。恐ろしいほど美しく。魂が隠されていた知恵を手にしたとき、不可能なことはなくなる。

languages.text: 秘者观察着秘密的字迹，将它们念了出来，而仲裁者的身体也被重新塑造成了新的形象，既美丽、又恐怖。只要掌握了隐藏的智慧，一切便都变为可能。
languages.original_text: And the Domin read the words, and spoke them. And the Judge's body began to rebuild itself to a new design, as beautiful as it was terrifying. For nothing is impossible when a soul has grasped the hidden wisdom.

traits.locale_text: 秘者观察着秘密的字迹，将它们念了出来，而仲裁者的身体也被重新塑造成了新的形象，既美丽、又恐怖。只要掌握了隐藏的智慧，一切便都变为可能。

languages.text: {mf|Le|La} Domin lut les mots et les prononça. Le corps du Juge commença alors à se transformer pour prendre une apparence aussi belle que terrifiante. Car rien n'est impossible à une âme dotée de la sagesse cachée.
languages.original_text: And the Domin read the words, and spoke them. And the Judge's body began to rebuild itself to a new design, as beautiful as it was terrifying. For nothing is impossible when a soul has grasped the hidden wisdom.

traits.locale_text: {mf|Le|La} Domin lut les mots et les prononça. Le corps du Juge commença alors à se transformer pour prendre une apparence aussi belle que terrifiante. Car rien n'est impossible à une âme dotée de la sagesse cachée.

languages.text: Ardından Domin, kelimeleri okuyup onlarla konuştu. Yargıç'ın bedeni ise kendini güzel olduğu kadar ürkütücü, yeni bir tasarımla baştan yaratmaya koyuldu. Zira bir ruh, gizli bilgeliği kavradığında hiçbir şey imkânsız değildir.
languages.original_text: And the Domin read the words, and spoke them. And the Judge's body began to rebuild itself to a new design, as beautiful as it was terrifying. For nothing is impossible when a soul has grasped the hidden wisdom.
